General.Name: Irish Continental Group PLC
General.Description: Irish Continental Group plc operates as a maritime transport company. It operates through two segments, Ferries, and Container and Terminal. The Ferries segment engages in the provision of passenger and roll on roll off freight shipping, and container lift on lift off (LoLo) freight services on routes between Ireland, Britain, and Continental Europe. The Container and Terminal segment provides door-to-door and feeder LoLo freight services, stevedoring, and other related terminal services, as well as operates container terminals in the ports of Dublin and Belfast. The company also provides container shipping, ship leasing, administration, and container handling services. In addition, it operates ferry; and act as a shipping and forwarding agency. The company was founded in 1972 and is based in Dublin, Ireland.
